SELECT
  uq.id                AS instancia_id,
  uq.meta_codigo       AS meta_codigo,
  uq.status            AS status,
  uq.progresso_meta    AS progresso_meta,
  uq.progresso_atual   AS progresso_atual,
  uq.concluido_em      AS concluido_em,
  uq.xp_concedido      AS xp_concedido,
  uq.contexto_origem   AS contexto_origem,
  uq.atualizado_em     AS atualizado_em,
  mc.titulo            AS titulo,
  mc.descricao         AS descricao,
  mc.config            AS config,
  mc.xp_recompensa     AS xp_recompensa,
  mc.codigo            AS modelo_codigo,
  mc.gatilho_codigo    AS gatilho_codigo,
  mc.gatilho_valor     AS gatilho_valor,
  mc.tipo              AS tipo
FROM public.usuarios_quest uq
JOIN public.metas_catalogo mc ON mc.id = uq.modelo_id
WHERE uq.usuario_id = $1::uuid
  AND mc.tipo = 'personalizada'
ORDER BY
  CASE uq.status
    WHEN 'ativa' THEN 0
    WHEN 'pendente' THEN 1
    WHEN 'reiniciada' THEN 2
    WHEN 'concluida' THEN 3
    WHEN 'vencida' THEN 4
    WHEN 'cancelada' THEN 5
    ELSE 6
  END,
  uq.atualizado_em DESC
LIMIT 20;

SELECT
  usuario_id,
  xp_total,
  xp_proximo_nivel,
  nivel_atual,
  titulo_nivel,
  sequencia_atual,
  sequencia_recorde,
  meta_sequencia_codigo,
  proxima_meta_codigo,
  sequencia_status
FROM public.usuarios_conquistas
WHERE usuario_id = $1::uuid;

WITH dias AS (
    SELECT generate_series(
        (CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '13 day')::date,
        CURRENT_DATE,
        INTERVAL '1 day'
    )::date AS dia
)
SELECT
    d.dia,
    EXISTS (
        SELECT 1
        FROM public.usr_chat uc
        WHERE uc.usuario_id = $1::uuid
          AND DATE(uc.data_conversa) = d.dia
    ) AS conversou
FROM dias d
ORDER BY d.dia DESC;
